name: Upright Row, on Multi Press
how_to_perform:
1. First, adjust the multi press machine to fit your body, ensuring your arms are at a comfortable height and your back is supported.

2. Place your hands shoulder-width apart on the bar handles of the machine so that they are facing downwards.
3. With your feet shoulder-width apart and your back straight, place your shoulders directly over the stack and engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine.

4. Next, lift the weight up from between the shoulder blades to above your head keeping your elbows high throughout the movement.
5. Squeeze your shoulder muscles together at the top of the movement for a brief pause.

6. Lower the weight back down to its starting position allowing it to rest between your shoulder blades and maintaining control on the descent.
7. Repeat this process using alternating arms, or choose to alternate sides every two repetitions.
8. Adjust the number of repetitions according to your desired fitness level.
short_summary: The upright row machine exercise works your upper back muscles while reducing strain from conventional free weights allowing users to build strength at their own comfort
